name: number-in-full-multilang
description: A lib to convert a number, that represents a value in Brazilian (BRL), American (USD), or Spanish (EUR) currency, into the value in full in these countries languages. Each one will be converted according to their respective currency: real, dollar and euro. For instance, if you choose portuguese (pt) in the function, you will obtain the number you insert written in full as a BRL value.
author: Rubens Mario
